query:
SELECT
                s.id as "id: Uuid",
                s.source as "source: SourceTypeValue",
                s.created_at as "created_at: DateTime<Utc>",
                d.url as "url: Url"
            FROM sources s
            LEFT JOIN
                source_atom_details d ON s.id = d.atom_details_id
            WHERE
                s.id = ?
